query:

  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users) as users_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM products) as products_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM invoices) as invoices_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM revenues) as revenues_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM expenses) as expenses_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM purchase_orders) as purchase_orders_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM inventory_counts) as inventory_counts_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM activity_logs) as activity_logs_count
